message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with the problem of autonomous vehicle control, specifically in the context of high-speed drifting. This falls under the category of robotics (cs.RO), which is the most likely sub-category. The proposed solution involves the use of deep reinforcement learning, which is a popular technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the formulation of the problem as a trajectory following task, which involves control systems (cs.SY). Finally, the paper uses visual inputs to control the vehicle, which is related to computer vision (cs.CV).
